Package DBAccess

Class DBCustomers

  • java.lang.Object
    • DBAccess.DBCustomers
  • public class DBCustomers
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that interacts with the database with regards to query with Customers.

        Receives the customer object to be updated and then updates in the database based on the customer Id.

      • deleteCustomer

        public static void deleteCustomer​(int customerId)
        Deletes the customer based on the customer ID. If customer has appointment's it can't be deleted. Displays an error message and on confirmation with the user, deletes all appointments for the customer.
